name: 20-sim
description: Modeling and simulation program for mechatronic systems and control.

name: 20-sim 4C
description: Rapid prototyping tool for embedded hardware and industrial controllers.

name: Adams
description: High end multibody dynamics simulation software from MSC Software

name: AGX Dynamics
description: AGX Dynamics is a professional multi-purpose physics engine for simulators, engineering, large scale granular simulators and more.

name: Amesim
description: Integrated simulation platform for the analysis of multi-domain mechatronics systems by Siemens PLM Software

name: ANSYS SCADE Display
description: SCADE Display facilitates embedded graphics, display and HMI development and certified code generation for safety-critical displays from ANSYS.

name: ANSYS SCADE Suite
description: SCADE Suite is a model-based development environment with certified code generation for safety critical embedded applications from ANSYS.

name: ANSYS Simplorer
description: ANSYS Simplorer is a multi-domain, multi-technology simulation program from ANSYS.

name: ANSYS DesignXplorer
description: DesignXplorer is able to export a computed response surface as an FMU.

name: ASim - AUTOSAR Simulation
description: AUTOSAR product from Dassault Systèmes

name: @Source
description: Simulink via @Source

name: B&R Automation Studio
description: B&Rs Automation Studio is a software engineering platform for industrial automation targetting PLCs, industrial PCs, HMI and embedded controllers from B&R.

name: AVL CRUISE
description: Vehicle system analysis tool for the optimization of fuel efficiency, emission, performance and driveability, from office to HiL to testbed.

name: AVL CRUISE M
description: AVL CRUISE™ M is a realtime, multi-disciplinary, vehicle system simulation software used in office environments for the design of powertrains and thermal management systems, in HiL environments for control function development and calibration, and in testbed environments to provide simulation models for component testing.

name: AVL Model.CONNECT
description: Model.CONNECT™ is a neutral model integration and co-simulation platform to connect virtual and real components for virtual, physical and mixed testing scenarios in office, HiL and testbed environments.

name: axisuite
description: Simulation of exhaust aftertreatment systems from Exothermia.

name: Building Controls Virtual Test Bed
description: BCVTB is a Software environment, based on Ptolemy II, for co-simulation of, and data exchange with, building energy and control systems.

name: BEAST
description: BEAST is an advanced dynamic simulation tool for rolling bearings and other mechanical systems with contacts available through SKF Engineering Consultancy Services. BEAST analyzes what will happen under real conditions and predicts the behaviour of complex equipment that incorporates rolling bearings.

name: Cameo Simulation Toolkit (MagicDraw plugin)
description: FMUs can be imported, represented, connected and co-simulated in SysML models.

name: CANoe
description: CANoe is the comprehensive software tool for development, test and analysis of entire ECU networks and individual ECUs.

name: CarMaker
description: CarMaker is an open test- and integration-platform for MiL, SiL and HiL.

name: CATIA
description: Environment for Product Design and Innovation, including systems engineering tools based on Modelica, by Dassault Systèmes

name: INTO-CPS Co-simulation Orchestration Engine (COE)
description: A free standalone FMI co-simulation master implemented in Java with a JSON API. It is developed as part of the INTO-CPS project.

name: ControlBuild
description: Environment for IEC 61131-3 control applications from Dassault Systèmes

name: Coral
description: Free and open-source software for distributed co-simulation.

name: CosiMate
description: Co-simulation Environment from ChiasTek

name: CPPFMU
description: Interfaces and helper functions for writing FMI-compliant model/slave code in C++.

name: Cybernetica CENIT
description: Industrial product for nonlinear Model Predictive Control (NMPC) from Cybernetica.

name: Cybernetica ModelFit
description: Software for model verification, state and parameter estimation, using logged process data. By Cybernetica.

name: DACCOSIM
description: Master Algorithm generator & deployer from RISEGrid for a multi-OS, multi-threaded and distributed cosimulation implementing all the FMI 2.0 features.

name: DAFUL
description: Intergrated structure and motion analysis software from VirtualMotion.

name: DS - FMU Export from Simulink
description: FMI Kit for Simulink provided by Dassault Systèmes - Simulink Coder Target for export of FMUs from Simulink.

name: DS - FMU Import into Simulink
description: FMI Kit for Simulink provided by Dassault Systèmes - Simulink block for import of FMUs into Simulink.

name: DSHplus
description: Fluid power simulation software from FLUIDON

name: dSPACE SCALEXIO
description: dSPACE SCALEXIO is a Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) integration and simulation platform from dSPACE. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI 1.0 and FMI 2.0 support.

name: dSPACE SYNECT
description: dSPACE SYNECT is a data management tool from dSPACE that enables you to manage FMUs and Simulink models as well as their dependencies, versions and variants throughout the entire software development process. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI support.

name: dSPACE TargetLink
description: TargetLink is a production code generator from dSPACE that generates highly efficient C-code directly from Simulink/Stateflow models. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI support.

name: dSPACE VEOS
description: dSPACE VEOS is a PC-based virtual integration and simulation platform from dSPACE. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI 1.0 and FMI 2.0 support.

name: Dymola
description: Modelica environment from Dassault Systèmes.

name: DYNA4
description: Open and flexible simulation framework by TESIS DYNAware.

name: Easy5
description: High performance simulation environment for multi-domain system dynamics from MSC Software.

name: EcosimPro
description: EcosimPro, System Modelling and Simulation Software

name: EMTP-RV
description: EMTP-RV is a power system simulation tool. Version 3.4 or higher is required to use the FMI capabilities.

name: EnergyPlus
description: Whole building energy simulation program

name: ETAS - ASCMO
description: Creation and export of statistical (meta) models using Design of Experiments (DoE) from ETAS.

id: ETAS - FMI-based Integration and Simulation Platform
name: ETAS - FMI-based Integration and Simulation Platform
description: Integration and simulation platform based on FMI 1.0 from ETAS.

name: ETAS - FMU Generator for ASCET
description: FMU Generator for ASCET from ETAS.

name: ETAS - FMU Generator for Simulink<sup>®</sup>
description: FMU Generator for Simulink® from ETAS.

name: ETAS - INCA-FLOW (MiL/SiL Connector)
description: Guided and automated calibration of FMUs with connection to ETAS INCA.

name: ETAS - ISOLAR-EVE (ETAS Virtual ECU)
description: PC based platform from ETAS for ECU software validation at the component, sub-system or system level; allows for validation of Application Software, Basis Software and complete ECU software in a virtual environment.

name: ETAS - LABCAR-OPERATOR
description: Frontend for ETAS HiL systems LABCAR, operating on the creation of experiments and their subsequent execution.

name: Flowmaster
description: High capability 1D CFD tool for thermo-fluid simulation from Mentor Graphics.

name: FMI Add-in for Excel
description: FMI Add-in for Microsoft Excel by ​Modelon. Offers support for batch simulation of FMUs.

name: FMI add-on for NI VeriStand
description: NI VeriStand supports FMI through the use of the FMI add-on for NI VeriStand from Dofware

name: FMI Blockset for Simulink
description: The FMI Blockset for Simulink enables the import of FMUs for use in Simulink - developed by Claytex.

name: FMI Composer
description: FMI Composer from Modelon is a software platform enabling users to build system models from multiple FMUs. FMI Composer is built entirely on the FMI and upcoming SSP standards.

name: FMI Bench
description: Workbench for inspection, customization and pre-integration of FMUs including parallelization and stand-alone simulation generation from PMSF.

name: FMI Library
description: Open source (BSD) C library for integration of FMI technology in custom applications by Modelon.

name: FMI Target for Simulink Coder
description: Export of stand-alone FMUs for Co-Simulation from Simulink using Simulink Coder - provided by ITI

name: FMI Toolbox for MATLAB/Simulink
description: The FMI Toolbox for MATLAB/Simulink from Modelon enables FMU import and export for MATLAB/Simulink for both model exchange and co-simulation.

name: FMPy
description: A Python library to simulate FMUs

name: FMUSDK
description: FMU Software Development Kit from QTronic.

name: General Energy Systems (GES)
description: GES is an object oriented simulation tool, for dynamic and static (algebraic) systems, Based on a hybrid bondgraph model. The tool is mainly used for ship power designs. Provided by TNO.

name: GT-SUITE
description: Multi-Physics Simulation Platform for Powertrain and Vehicle Systems

name: Hopsan
description: Hopsan is a free simulation tool developed at Linköping University. It is using distributed solver techniques with good support for parallelism using multi-core processors.

name: IBM Rational Rhapsody
description: IBM® Rational® Rhapsody® family provides a collaborative design, development and test environment for systems engineers and software engineers.

name: ICOS Independent Co-Simulation
description: ICOS is a co-simulation tool developed by Virtual Vehicle

name: IGNITE
description: Physics-based system simulation software for complete vehicle system modeling and simulation from Ricardo Software.

name: JavaFMI
description: JavaFMI is a Java wrapper for the Functional Mock-up Interface (1.0 or 2.0) both for Windows/Linux 32 or 64 bit OS.

name: JFMI
description: A Java Wrapper for the Functional Mock-up Interface, based on FMU SDK

name: JModelica.org
description: Open source Modelica environment from Modelon

name: LMS Virtual.Lab Motion
description: Virtual.Lab Motion is a high end multi body software from LMS International

name: MapleSim
description: Modelica-based modeling and simulation tool from Maplesoft
platforms: c-code darwin64 linux32 linux64 win32 win64

name: Mechanical Simulation: CarSim, TruckSim, BikeSim
description: CarSim, TruckSim, and BikeSim are vehicle dynamics software solutions from Mechanical Simulation that support XiL development workflows and power real-time driving simulators around the globe.

name: MESSINA
description: MESSINA is a test platform for model-based ECU function development.

name: MoBA Lab
description: MoBA Lab gives the user a wide-ranging portfolio of different tools for the model-based development process of thermal and other types of systems. The MoBA Simulator is available for Excel, Python, C++, and various other environments.

name: Morphee
description: MORPHEE is a system for automation, simulation and calibration from FEV.

name: MWorks

name: NI LabVIEW

description: Open source Modelica environment from OSMC

name: optiSLang

name: PROOSIS
description: PROOSIS, Propulsion Object-Oriented Simulation Software

name: Ptolemy II
description: Software environment for design and analysis of heterogeneous systems.

name: PyFMI
description: For Python via the open source package PyFMI from Modelon. Also available as part of the JModelica.org platform.

name: RecurDyn
description: High End Multi Flexible Body Dynamcis Software from FunctionBay

name: Reference FMUs
description: Reference FMUs supplied by enthusiasts and volunteers to show case specific FMU features

name: Scilab/Xcos FMU wrapper
description: FMI support for Scilab / Xcos a free and open source software for numerical computation.

name: Silver
description: Generation of virtual ECUs and virtual integration platform for Software in the Loop from QTronic.

name: SIMPACK
description: High end multi-body simulation software from SIMPACK AG

name: SimulationX
description: Multi-domain simulation tool for design, analysis and virtual prototyping of complex systems developed by ESI ITI GmbH.

name: Simulation Workbench (SimWB)
description: SimWB is an open, powerful framework to run SIL, HIL, and MIL simulations under Concurrents hard real-time RedHawk OS that runs on COTS hardware.

name: solidThinking Activate
description: Software environment for modeling, simulation and analysis of multi-disciplinary systems from Altair.

name: Squish GUI Tester
description: Squish is a GUI Test Automation Tool. As an FMU importer, Squish test scripts can access all variables exposed by a FMU and is responsible for driving the simulation process.

name: SystemModeler
description: Modelica environment from Wolfram Research.

name: TLK FMI Suite
description: TLK FMI Suite provides LabVIEW and Simulink blocks for FMU simulation

name: TLK TISC Suite
description: Co-simulation environment from TLK-Thermo

name: TRNSYS FMU Export Utility
description: A stand-alone tool for exporting FMUs for Co-Simulation from TRNSYS models.

name: TWT Co-Simulation Framework
description: Communication layer tool to flexibly plug together models for performing a co-simulation; front-end for set-up, monitoring and post-processing included

name: TWT FMU Trust Centre
description: Cryptographic protection and signature of models including their safe PLM storage; secure authentication and authorization for protected (co-)simulation

name: VALDYN
description: Multi-body dynamic and kinematic simulation for valvetrain, powertrain and transmission systems from Ricardo Software.

name: Virtual Engine
description: Multibody dynamics simulation software for internal combustion engines, transmissions and their components from FEV.

name: WAVE-RT
description: Real-time, crank-angle resolved engine simulation tool for testing new engine management systems in SiL, HiL, and rapid-prototyping from Ricardo Software.

name: XFlow
description: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) code which uses a particle-based kinetic solver based on the Lattice-Boltzmann Method, thus avoids the meshing process and allows complex fluid-structure interaction including through FMI standard co-simulation.

name: xMOD
description: Heterogeneous model integration environment & virtual instrumentation and experimentation laboratory from IFPEN distributed by D2T.
